notes: FBA inventory only. For merchant-fulfilled (MFN) inventory, quantity is managed via the Listings API (fulfillment_availability attribute). Delta sync: pass startDateTime = last_sync_timestamp.

fields.name: fnSku
fields.description: Fulfillment Network SKU assigned by Amazon

fields.name: inventoryDetails.fulfillableQuantity
fields.description: Available-to-sell quantity. Only present when details=true.

fields.name: inventoryDetails.inboundWorkingQuantity
fields.description: Units in an inbound shipment not yet received. details=true required.

fields.name: inventoryDetails.inboundShippedQuantity
fields.description: Units shipped to Amazon but not yet received. details=true required.

fields.name: inventoryDetails.inboundReceivingQuantity
fields.description: Units being received at Amazon fulfillment center. details=true required.

fields.name: lastUpdatedTime
fields.description: Last time this record was updated by Amazon

fields.name: productName
fields.description: Product name from the Amazon catalog
